extendedInfo.description: Number Counting Game for Kids under the age group from 2-5 years. Kids will learn numbers (1,2,3...) with fun by counting the chicks. Simply touch on the chicks in the screens, the number will shown on the screen and number will be spoken as words to the kids. Kids simply love this game and kids will ask you again and again to learn counting numbers with this game. This game works beautifully on Tablets and Big Screens.1) Learn Counting Number (1,2,3...)2) Touch on Chicks to Count3) Number are shown in screen4) Number are spoken in words to the kids4) Special Support for Tablets and Big ScreensInstalling Instructions:================Need Adobe Flash Player to Run. If Adobe Flash Player is not installed, then it will redirect to App Store for installing Adobe Flash Player. After installing it will work fine.Keywords:========Kids, Kid, Counting, Numbers, Number, Game, Free, Alphabets, Alphabet, Children, Child, Fun, Loving, 1,2,3Ads information:============In order to provide free game, we have put Ads. These banner ads will not disturb you.Bug Reporting:===========If you find any bugs, please report it to info@creativesoftwarestudio.comRatings & Improvement:=================Please rate us on Play Store and give your feedback to info@creativesoftwarestudio.com, so that we can improve it.Our Website:==========http://www.creativesoftwarestudio.com/games/Facebook Page:============http://www.facebook.com/pages/Creative-Software-Studio/398316796910914Twitter Page:=========https://twitter.com/css_appsPrivacy Policy==========http://www.creativesoftwarestudio.com/privacy/

reviews.title: Sad
reviews.comment: It\'s really good game if there is next level with different  picture. Happy with barney picture. So need big time updating
reviews.author: dale rees

reviews.comment: Adobe doesnt work past 4.0 & mine is way past. My son would love this app if it worked without adobe
reviews.author: Karla Mondragon
